name: tinted-lens
effect: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.
short_effect: Doubles damage inflicted with not-very-effective moves.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
